welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Conroe, where Southern charm meets natural beauty. Explore our charming downtown, enjoy our beautiful lakes, and experience our friendly hospitality."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial flights and includes check-in counters, baggage claim, and gates.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private and charter flights, with separate facilities for passengers and crew.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal E
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
